thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Bradley Irwin

author: Bradley Irwin
title: Bradley Irwin
text: I never really appreciated quality hose fittings until i received my new Hoselink hose fittings and sprayer and starting using them. From the moment i placed the fittings in my hand, i could feel the quality and the engineering elegance. I almost couldnt wait to put them on the hose and try them out. As anticipated, the fittings and hose sprayer perform exceptionally well. Also the instruction manual on how to fit the fittings were clear and precise.
